items.title: Spectral Floor (Standing Assumption)
items.content:
344: :label: assump-spectral-floor
345: 
346: There exists $\Lambda_- \ge 0$ such that for all swarm states $S$ and walkers $i$:
347: 
348: $$
349: \lambda_{\min}(H(x_i, S)) \ge -\Lambda_-
350: $$
